body.name: Elitehood 2023 Newest Ultra-Stable Overhead Tripod for iPhone – Heavy Duty Aluminum Tripod & 25in Horizontal Long Phone Arm, Tall Phone Stand Mount for Recording, 360°Adjustable iPhone Tripod Stand

features: 【More Stable Base & Longer Arm】 Features heavy duty aluminum tripod (weighted: 2.2lbs), this phone stand for video recording will hold your heavy cell phone firmly even in a windy day. The arm can be adjusted up to 25 inches which gives you options for how far out you want it to reach, especially those deeper hard-to-reach spots. It’s a must stand for overhead video recording, filming, baking, scanning, outdoor time-lapse shootings and long exposure photography.

【Compatible with More Devices】 When you are making some cooking videos or painting, you may encounter situations where the shot doesn't look good because of the lack of light. The ball head is removable so you can attach this ball head and phone holder to the ring light then connect it with the horizontal arm to realize the combination of the fill light and the overhead phone mount stand. It's much useful for Cooking, Baking, Crafting, Drawing, Nail Art, Tattoo etc.

【Tall Versatile Tripod】 Support both horizontal and vertical video recording, this tall overhead tripod for iPhone is extendable from 20 to 71 inches to meet your various outdoor and indoor photography needs. Using the spirit level you can adjust the legs individually to make it level on uneven ground. (Only 20inch when it folded, a quality carrying bag included for travel)

【Free Angle Adjustment】 With 360°horizontally rotatable & extendable cross arm, smoothly switch landscape and portrait mode, this iPhone stand for recording is designed to help you get to some hard-to-reach spots and challenging angles while in horizontal mode. Owing to the flexible tripod ball head, it is great allowing also for video panning, taking vertical, horizontal and inclined view photos/videos to capture all expected or surprising angles, recording your wonderful moments.

【Universal Compatibility】 The upgraded phone holder can be extended from 2.5 to 4.5 inches, fits all iPhone and Android cellphone even with a bulky case, such as iPhone 15 14 13 Pro Max/ 14 13 1 12 Pro/ 14 13 12 11 Xs Max Xr X 8 Plus, Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra S20 Note 20 and more smartphone. Besides, there is a 1/4” screw hole on the side of the clip where a led light can be connected to fill light. Comes with a wireless remote, you can start your recording or taking picture easily via the remote.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Elitehood 2023 Newest Detachable iPhone Tripod Perfect for Overhead Recording - 25" extendable boom, long enough for recording something while making some cooking videos or painting on the table or kitchen counter. Compatible with More Devices - Detachable design makes it more versatile with lots of options to mount different devices. You can attach a ring light to the arm or connect the led fill light to the side of the phone clamp via the 1/4” screw. You can also mount a camera on this tripod. Ultra - stable Aluminum Tripod - Built by high quality aluminium alloy (Weight 2.29 lbs), this iPhone tripod is heavier & stronger than others. Cover All-around Viewing Angle - Easily rotated, tilted and swiveled to any angle plus 360°rotatable boom, allow you to capture all expected or surprising angles, recording your wonderful moments. .

25" Long & Rotatable Boom 360° rotatable arm, capturing better content on your phone Constructed by heavy duty aluminum, this overhead iPhone tripod keeps stable and well balanced even you extend the boom up to 25 inches. 360 rotatable arm allow to swivel it get your position. It is an Ideal partner for doing something on the table or kitchen counter. Perfect for overhead shooting, video recording, vlogs, Youtube videos, podcasts, Facebook Live, Face Time, Instagram, Live Streaming and More...

Not only this iPhone tripod can be used for horizontal video recording, but also it can hold your cellphone to take vertical video or photo. It covers almost all around viewing angle! Phone Holder: 360° Rotation - Easily switch portrait & landscape mode Ball Head: 90° Vertical Shot - Another way to switch horizontal & portrait mode 360° Tilt - Tilt to any angle you want 360° Swivel - Swivel to get your position. Perfect for panoramic shots

Make full use of your lens language to shoot creative videos and photos. Expand from 21 to 71inches, this tall and compact phone tripod can meet your various outdoor and indoor photography needs even in uneven ground or a windy day. 3-section column allows you to adjust the height to capture a variety of different video content scenarios.

Focus on Detail Arm with Standard 1/4"-20 Thread This ball head is removable so you can attach a ring light to the cross arm to realize the combination of the fill light and the overhead iPhone tripod stand. It's much useful for Overhead Video Recording, Cooking, Baking, Crafting, Drawing, Nail Art, Tattoo etc. 1/4" Male to Male Adapter It comes with a 1/4" male to male screw adapter, You can connect the led fill light to the side of the phone holder via the 1/4” screw. Ball Head with 1/4" Thread Detachable design iPhone tripod is versatile with lots of options to mount different devices. it’s suitable for Gopro/ring light/Binocular/Canon Nikon Sony Panasonic DSRL cameras and others devices which has 1/4" thread hole.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It fits my iPhone 15 Pro Max just fine even in its sleek case. I use it for all social content - posts, reels, and YouTube videos. Really love the overhead shooting you can do with it too. It can go in pretty much all directions. Worth buying for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good enough for basic work
reviews.reviewText: I only need this for overhead recording of my hands, overhead pic taking, and occasional straight on recording. For those purposes it works fine and I don't move it around much so durability seems to be fine. Assembly was quick and painless. It is a lightweight tripod so for anyone with more strenuous needs they'll want to get a more robust and expensive unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Small Business
reviews.reviewText: I use this to make videos for Youtube. Love the "overhead" pole. I adjust my camera for the angle I need.Easy to set up! Lightweight! Nice carry bag!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I use this film most of my YouTube videos
reviews.reviewText: I use this overhead tripod to film most of my YouTube videos. It works great. There are better tripods but I don’t know of any at this price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The only review you need to read
reviews.reviewText: I just returned this product. This is your warning to NOT buy this. Does not keep your iPhone level whatsoever. I had to try and attach weights to one side of the device in order to make it level. The horizontal arm is useless. Not level whatsoever when you extend and have it hold your phone. Do not waste your money and then waste your time going to UPS to return this product. I NEVER write reviews — this truly called for a 1 star review. You’re welcome for saving you your money and time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Good quality and easy setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Almost has it all!
reviews.reviewText: This product is sturdy and great quality! You can honestly adjust it to pretty much any configuration that you’d require and it stays put.My only gripe is that it doesn’t come with a ring light (or a light source of any sort). I know it’s not advertised as doing so, but a light would make this the ultimate one-stop-shop experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like this tripod. It is extremely adjustable and is great for just about any position. I really like that you can set it up to angle it straight down to film something on a table. It would be great for someone who wants to film themselves drawing, or someone who reviews small handheld items. It is very sturdy and looks really good. It is also a good weight. I am very happy with this tripod.
